experience.description: Support the pricing and valuation teams by performing experience studies for group health products. Maintain and update actuarial models to reflect current mortality and morbidity trends. Assist in the preparation of quarterly financial reports and regulatory filings using SQL and Excel.

Assisted in the calculation of loss reserves using chain-ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methods. Developed VBA macros to automate data reconciliation between the claims database and actuarial software. Conducted sensitivity analysis on proposed rate changes for personal auto lines.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
